Back to Felix Mendelssohn

Felix Mendelssohn

Lieder ohne Worte, Book 4, op. 53

1835–1841 · MWV U 109, 114, 143–144, 153–154

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 15'

  • 1. A-flat major
  • 2. E-flat major
  • 3. G minor (Gondellied)
  • 4. F major (Abendlied)
  • 5. A minor (Volkslied)
  • 6. A major

The pieces are spread over multiple entries in the Leipzig Edition catalogue.

no.MWV Uyear
11431839
21091835
31441839
41141835
51531841
61541841

Recommended editions

  • Bärenreiter · BA 9069 · Lieder ohne Worte · ed. R. Larry Todd
  • Henle · HN 327 · Klavierwerke / Band III / Lieder ohne Worte · ed. Rudolf Elvers / Ernst Herttrich [including two versions of no. 4]
  • Könemann · K 176 · Lieder ohne Worte II · ed. István Máriássy
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50075 · Lieder ohne Worte · ed. Christa Jost [including two versions of no. 1]

1. A-flat major

Difficulty: 3
